segments.text: Mom , may I play the card games for a while ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you ? Dad is in the study .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I won't make any noise . Mom , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Behave yourself ! Don't make any noise . Have you finished your homework ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: er ... , mom , I promise . I won't make a single noise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . Just five minutes . Be sure not to touch anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok . I won't get into trouble .
segments.speaker: S1
